sql.query: CREATE TABLE `draft_decisions` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `key_val` varchar(45) NOT NULL, `senior_editor_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `junior_editor_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `article_id` int(11) NOT NULL, `decision` int(11) NOT NULL, `subject` varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, `body` text, `note` text, `attatchment` text, `status` varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) );

CREATE TABLE draft_decisions ( id bigserial PRIMARY KEY, key_val varchar(45) NOT NULL, senior_editor_id numeric(11) NOT NULL, junior_editor_id numeric(11) NOT NULL, article_id numeric(11) NOT NULL, decision numeric(11) NOT NULL, subject varchar(200) DEFAULT NULL, body text, note text, attatchment text, status varchar(45) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (id) ) ;
